de.mpa.analysis.taxonomy

Class TaxonomyUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.analysis.taxonomy.TaxonomyUtils

  • public class TaxonomyUtils
extends Object
    This class serves as utility class for various methods handling taxonomic issues.
    Author:
    T. Muth, A. Behne

    • Method Detail

      • createTaxonomyNode

        public static TaxonomyNode createTaxonomyNode(long currentID,
                                              Map<Long,Taxonomy> taxonomyMap)
        This method creates a taxonomy node which contains all ancestor taxonomy nodes up to the root node.
        Parameters:
        currentID - Taxonomy ID
        taxonomyMap - Taxonomy Map containing taxonomy DB accessor objects.
        Returns:
        TaxonomyNode Taxonomy node in the end state.

      • createTaxonomyNode

        public static TaxonomyNode createTaxonomyNode(long currentID,
                                              Map<Long,Taxonomy> taxonomyMap,
                                              Connection conn)
        Creates a taxonomy node which contains all ancestor taxonomy nodes up to the root node. Looks up unmapped IDs in the remote database and stores them in the provided map.
        Parameters:
        currentID - the taxonomy ID of the start element
        taxonomyMap - map containing taxonomy ID-to-taxonomy node mappings
        conn - the database connection
        Returns:
        the desired taxonomy node
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database error occurs

      • determinePeptideTaxonomy

        public static void determinePeptideTaxonomy(Set<PeptideHit> peptideSet,
                                            TaxonomyUtils.TaxonomyDefinition definition)
        Method to go through a peptide set and define for each peptide hit the common taxonomy of the subsequent proteins.
        Parameters:
        peptideSet - the peptide set

      • determineMetaProteinTaxonomy

        public static void determineMetaProteinTaxonomy(ProteinHitList metaProteins,
                                                ParameterMap params)
        Sets the taxonomy of meta-proteins contained in the specified list to the common taxonomy based on their child protein taxonomies.
        Parameters:
        metaProteins - the list of meta-proteins for which common protein taxonomies shall be determined
        params - the parameter map containing taxonomy definition rules

      • determineProteinTaxonomy

        public static void determineProteinTaxonomy(List<ProteinHit> proteins,
                                            ParameterMap params)
        Sets the taxonomy of proteins contained in the specified list to the common taxonomy based on their peptide taxonomies.
        Parameters:
        proteins - List of proteins hits.
        params - the parameter map containing taxonomy definition rules

      • determineTaxonomy

        public static void determineTaxonomy(List<? extends Taxonomic> taxList,
                                     TaxonomyUtils.TaxonomyDefinition definition)
        Sets the taxonomy of the elements of the specified taxonomic list to the common taxonomy based on their child taxonomies.
        Parameters:
        taxList - the list of taxonomic instances
        definition - the taxonomy definition

      • getTaxonNameByRank

                                        UniProtUtilities.TaxonomyRank taxRank)
        Gets the tax name by the rank from the NCBI taxonomy.
        Parameters:
        proteinHit - Protein hit
        taxRank - The taxonomic rank
        Returns:
        The name of the taxonomy.
